item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $149.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)



【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!
【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)
【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS WITH ADAPTERS】Consistently smoke test EVAP systems, Vacuum leaks, low pressure Turbo leaks, Intake Manifolds, Cooling / EGR / Exhaust Systems, worn rubber, gaskets, seals, connectors, and more! The tapered smoke injection nozzle fits into virtually all hoses and lines.
【 PRECISE AND SAFE】Engineered 100% safe for all vehicles. Thick Smoke output detects even the smallest leaks. Every unit Is backed by 1 YEAR FULL COVERAGE WARRANTY! AS AN AMERICAN FAMILY BUSINESS, we stand proudly behind our products. If you have any issues, don’t hesitate to contact us directly.
【 HOW DOES IT WORK?】(1) Fill with the included OEM Approved Smoke Fluid. The kit operates with the included OEM Approved Fluid or you may use your own USP Mineral Oil / Baby Oil. (2) Fasten the Power Cable (3) Warm up for 3 minutes and then turn on the Built-In Air Motor. (4) Check for LEAKS with Smoke Detection Technology.

4.5

Learn More


Feeling down with poor air quality?

Previous page

  1. Does your air feel stuffy?

    Small rooms can have poor air circulation, making them feel stuffy—especially when outdoor pollution is bad.

  2. Struggling to sleep?

    It’s hard to sleep soundly when airborne pollutants, such as dust and pollen, cause headaches, congestion, and coughing.

  3. Finding it hard to concentrate?

    Smoky smells, pollen from desk flowers, and airborne dust can make it difficult to focus at work.

  4. Noticing pet dander and smell?

    We love our pets, but these cute furry friends can come with pet dander and odors that lower our air quality.

Next page

Want to combat these issues but running into problems like these…

Poor Performance

Some air purifiers can run all night, but still do little to improve our air quality.

Loud & Noisy

Many conventional air purifiers operate with high noise levels, making it hard to fall asleep.

Too Big & Bulky

Lots of air purifiers are so big, it’s hard to find space for them in small rooms.

No Fragrance

Many air purifiers don’t offer the ability to add essential oils.

Finally, Meet the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

Previous page
Next page

The results? It has seriously made a world of difference!

No space is too small for this compact air purifier

Put it on your nightstand

Noticed a difference in sleep quality

Use it at the office

Put all your energy into your work

Place it on your dresser

Reduced the amount of dust on your dresser

Refresh your living room

It circulates the air well and makes it feel fresh.

“Mini” but Great

  1. We can’t always do great things, but we can do ‘mini’ things with great love.

    Whether you’re putting together your nursery, upgrading your workspace, or adding aromatherapy to your room—discover the “Great” difference one “Mini” air purifier can make.

  2. Every Mini Detail

    Every aspect of the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier is designed with thoughtful innovation, so you can create a healthy space that’s just right for you.

4.5
Price: $49.99 - $41.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

Contrast before and after the use of the rearview mirror rain cover:

1. The vision will be better in rainy days, don’t worry about the blurred vision caused by the raindrops on the rearview mirror.

2. The rear-view mirror rain cover can reduce the glare of the rear-view mirror under the sun, making your driving safer.

3. It can also be used as a car decoration at ordinary times to make your car more sporty.

Step 1

Clean the mirrors.

Step 2

Tear off the adhesive.

Step 3

Install to target location.

Step 4

The installation is complete.

【Material】: Our car rear view mirror rain eyebrow is made of soft PVC plastic that is 100% soft and flexible. It will not break or deform easily and can meet your needs for a long time.
【Size】: The size of this rear view guard eyebrow is about 7.28*2.17in, appropriate size will prevent rain from falling on the rearview mirror without blocking your view, full protection for your rearview mirror.
【Wide Application】: The side mirror rain guard can be widely applied in most kinds of cars and vehicles, like trucks, buses, tractors, SUVs, motorcycles and so on.
【Easy to Install】: The mixed adhesive is very sticky but does not leave marks, please pay attention to clean the rearview mirror before sticking and installing it when it is dry and dust free.
【Safe Driving】: Rain and heavy snow can blur the rearview mirror and thus interfere with your driving vision. Installing rain eyebrows can effectively block the interference of rain and snow, provide a clear vision and improve the safety of driving on rainy days.

  1. High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.
  2. Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.
  3. Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.
  4. Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

item.title: Automotive Smoke Leak Tester,EVAP Smoke Machine Diagnostic Leak Detector,Car Pipe Vacuum Leakage Tester & Fuel Pipe Leakage Detector for All 12V Cars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Technical Details Manufacturer ‎VXSCAN Brand ‎VXSCAN Item Weight ‎5.26 pounds Package Dimensions ‎11.54 x 9.84 x 6.81 inches Country of Origin ‎China Manufacturer Part Number ‎V3 Additional Information ASIN B0B1M7NPXT Customer Reviews 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive) ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer ‎VXSCAN
Brand ‎VXSCAN
Item Weight ‎5.26 pounds
Package Dimensions ‎11.54 x 9.84 x 6.81 inches
Country of Origin ‎China
Manufacturer Part Number ‎V3

Additional Information

ASIN B0B1M7NPXT
Customer Reviews

5.0 out of 5 stars

2 ratings

5.0 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#45 in Fuel Leak Detectors
#1,777 in Diagnostic, Test & Measurement Tools
Date First Available May 18, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

VXSCAN is focusing on affordable prices, top quality for every customer.

You Can Trust VXSCAN

VXSCAN is to make our products serve everyone in need all over the world. To this end, we will devote ourselves to professional research and strive to make the best of our products and services.

The Goal of VXSCAN

It is aiming to provide automobile repairers with more professional, simple, practical, economical, efficient and high-quality auto diagnosis products and maintenance tools.

The Service of VXSCAN

To provide an better service customer is one of important reasons for our success and our eternal goal.

VXSCAN is committed to doing an professional supplier of automobile maintenance products,focuses on sloving automotive aftermamrket problems cost-effectively,effciently and conveniently.We hope make every user satisfied is our ultimate pursuit of every product.

【EVAP Leak Detector】V3 Smoke machine can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems. the provided mineral oil creates smoke that’s pumped it through your vehicle’s piping to help you detect the leak’s precise location.
【Why You Need V3】These Situations – 1.The rupture of the vacuum hose will cause the mixture to be too thick, the idle speed will increase, the hot car will not start well, the engine will surge during acceleration, the fuel consumption will increase significantly, and the exhaust pipe will emit black smoke.2. Blocking will cause the idle speed to drift, and the idle speed is easy to stall.3. Air leakage in the vacuum tube will cause the engine to run weakly.
【Easy Operation】1.Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.2. Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.3. Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.4.The pipe will be filled with smoke. Check the leak points. Note：The packaging does not contain oil but there is an oil delivery bottle.
【Adjustable Air Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge Display】You can easily control the air pressure, because if the air pressure is too high, the pipe will be damaged, and if the air pressure is too low, the leak will not be detected; You can observe the barometer to determine whether the car pipeline is leaking. If the barometer index keeps increasing, there is no problem with your car’s pipeline. On the contrary, your car’s pipeline leaks need to be repaired.
【Wide Compatibility】Fuel pipe leakage locator is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats. It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 automotive diagnostic smoke leak detector is designed for testing leaks in vehicle pipe systems.

It could be used on all cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATV, light trucks, boats, etc.

With VXSCAN V3, you can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems.

Full System Diagnoses, Won’t Miss Any Leak.

  • Crankcase System Test: Excessive pressure or corrosion of the crankcase is the main reason to damage the seal of the crankcase and cause oil leakage.
  • Intake System Test: Leakage in the air intake system will lead to insufficient intake of the car engine, which will result in scant engine power.
  • Car Sealing Test: Poor airtightness of the car may lead to a lot of inconvenience like inability to keep warm, not soundproof, not waterproof and not dust-proof, etc.
  • Fuel Tank System Test: When there are gaps in the fuel tank and piping caused by improper installation or insufficient sealing of the fuel tank cap, it can cause leaks in the fuel tank system.
  • Turbo Test: The leakage of coolant would cause the engine to report high water temperature.
  • Various Pipe Fitting Test: Smoke testing of brake hoses, power steering hoses, cooling system hoses, air conditioning system hoses, turbocharger hoses, fuel hoses, intake and exhaust system hoses, etc.
  • EVAP System Test: Leakage of the fuel evaporation system will cause fuel vapor to leak into the atmosphere, causing waste and pollution or unstable engine idling.
  • Exhaust System Test: Unpurified harmful gases to be discharged into the atmosphere or increase vehicle noise is the main disadvantage when leaks happened in the exhaust.

How to Operate the Automotive Smoke Leak Detector

Step 1

  • Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.

Step 2

  • Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.

Step 3

  • Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.

Step 4

  • The pipe will be filled with smoke.Check the leak points.

Read more

Package Includes

  • 1pc x VXSCAN V3 Main Unit
  • 1pc x Standard Cone Adapter (30-85mm)
  • 1pc x Funnel
  • 1pc x Replacement Rubber
  • 1pc x Intake bladder
  • 1pc x Smoke Hose
  • 1pc x Power Cord Clamp
  • 1pc x Test Oil Refill Bottle(oil not included)
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5.1 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

VXSCAN V3 Vacuum Smoke Tester Functions:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

EVAP V3 vacuum leak tester can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

  • Product Specifications:
  • Power Supply: 12V Vehicle Battery, <8Amp
  • Output Pressure: <1.2bar
  • Flow Rate: <7L/Min
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Working Cycle: 5 Min auto-stop

Read more

2 Mode: No need to buy extra air compressor

Air Mode: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE. It can help you test whether there is a leak in the pipe by injecting air into the pipe, and judge by the sound made when the air leaks.

Smoke Mode: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal. It helps you lacate the leak accuarately through the visible smoke. The smoke can be produced within seconds, dramatically reducing diagnostic time.

Overheat & Anti-frost Protection: Built in self-protective system

V3 EVAP vacuum tester is equipped with the latest intelligent protection device.

When the temperature of the device exceeds 70 degrees Celsius, the power protection device will be intelligently activated to turn it off, to ensure the safety of the operator and the device.

The device is also suitable for low temperature operation.

Wide Compatibility: Suitable for all vechicles

VXSCAN V3 vacuum leak smoke machine is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats.

It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

Read more

Pressure Gauge Displays

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Fast Smoke Output

This machine built-in air compressor, with superior wick and heating element.

It can produce smoke instantly by heating up USP mineral oil or baby oil. 4ft Smoke Outlet Pipe can help reach and connect perfectly.

Note: Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.

Notice before Leak Test

Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle.

It can’t be connected to the 12v power supply in the office, or it cannot output the smoke.It just support a 12V battery with a current range of 8A-10A (Ordinary car batteries are eligible).

Read more

Brand ‎VXSCAN

Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#45 in Fuel Leak Detectors
#1,777 in Diagnostic, Test & Measurement Tools
Date First Available May 18, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:29 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

VXSCAN is focusing on affordable prices, top quality for every customer.

You Can Trust VXSCAN

VXSCAN is to make our products serve everyone in need all over the world. To this end, we will devote ourselves to professional research and strive to make the best of our products and services.

The Goal of VXSCAN

It is aiming to provide automobile repairers with more professional, simple, practical, economical, efficient and high-quality auto diagnosis products and maintenance tools.

The Service of VXSCAN

To provide an better service customer is one of important reasons for our success and our eternal goal.

VXSCAN is committed to doing an professional supplier of automobile maintenance products,focuses on sloving automotive aftermamrket problems cost-effectively,effciently and conveniently.We hope make every user satisfied is our ultimate pursuit of every product.

【EVAP Leak Detector】V3 Smoke machine can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems. the provided mineral oil creates smoke that’s pumped it through your vehicle’s piping to help you detect the leak’s precise location.
【Why You Need V3】These Situations – 1.The rupture of the vacuum hose will cause the mixture to be too thick, the idle speed will increase, the hot car will not start well, the engine will surge during acceleration, the fuel consumption will increase significantly, and the exhaust pipe will emit black smoke.2. Blocking will cause the idle speed to drift, and the idle speed is easy to stall.3. Air leakage in the vacuum tube will cause the engine to run weakly.
【Easy Operation】1.Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.2. Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.3. Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.4.The pipe will be filled with smoke. Check the leak points. Note：The packaging does not contain oil but there is an oil delivery bottle.
【Adjustable Air Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge Display】You can easily control the air pressure, because if the air pressure is too high, the pipe will be damaged, and if the air pressure is too low, the leak will not be detected; You can observe the barometer to determine whether the car pipeline is leaking. If the barometer index keeps increasing, there is no problem with your car’s pipeline. On the contrary, your car’s pipeline leaks need to be repaired.
【Wide Compatibility】Fuel pipe leakage locator is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats. It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 automotive diagnostic smoke leak detector is designed for testing leaks in vehicle pipe systems.

It could be used on all cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATV, light trucks, boats, etc.

With VXSCAN V3, you can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems.

Full System Diagnoses, Won’t Miss Any Leak.

  • Crankcase System Test: Excessive pressure or corrosion of the crankcase is the main reason to damage the seal of the crankcase and cause oil leakage.
  • Intake System Test: Leakage in the air intake system will lead to insufficient intake of the car engine, which will result in scant engine power.
  • Car Sealing Test: Poor airtightness of the car may lead to a lot of inconvenience like inability to keep warm, not soundproof, not waterproof and not dust-proof, etc.
  • Fuel Tank System Test: When there are gaps in the fuel tank and piping caused by improper installation or insufficient sealing of the fuel tank cap, it can cause leaks in the fuel tank system.
  • Turbo Test: The leakage of coolant would cause the engine to report high water temperature.
  • Various Pipe Fitting Test: Smoke testing of brake hoses, power steering hoses, cooling system hoses, air conditioning system hoses, turbocharger hoses, fuel hoses, intake and exhaust system hoses, etc.
  • EVAP System Test: Leakage of the fuel evaporation system will cause fuel vapor to leak into the atmosphere, causing waste and pollution or unstable engine idling.
  • Exhaust System Test: Unpurified harmful gases to be discharged into the atmosphere or increase vehicle noise is the main disadvantage when leaks happened in the exhaust.

How to Operate the Automotive Smoke Leak Detector

Step 1

  • Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.

Step 2

  • Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.

Step 3

  • Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.

Step 4

  • The pipe will be filled with smoke.Check the leak points.

Read more

Package Includes

  • 1pc x VXSCAN V3 Main Unit
  • 1pc x Standard Cone Adapter (30-85mm)
  • 1pc x Funnel
  • 1pc x Replacement Rubber
  • 1pc x Intake bladder
  • 1pc x Smoke Hose
  • 1pc x Power Cord Clamp
  • 1pc x Test Oil Refill Bottle(oil not included)
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5.1 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

VXSCAN V3 Vacuum Smoke Tester Functions:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

EVAP V3 vacuum leak tester can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

  • Product Specifications:
  • Power Supply: 12V Vehicle Battery, <8Amp
  • Output Pressure: <1.2bar
  • Flow Rate: <7L/Min
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Working Cycle: 5 Min auto-stop

Read more

2 Mode: No need to buy extra air compressor

Air Mode: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE. It can help you test whether there is a leak in the pipe by injecting air into the pipe, and judge by the sound made when the air leaks.

Smoke Mode: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal. It helps you lacate the leak accuarately through the visible smoke. The smoke can be produced within seconds, dramatically reducing diagnostic time.

Overheat & Anti-frost Protection: Built in self-protective system

V3 EVAP vacuum tester is equipped with the latest intelligent protection device.

When the temperature of the device exceeds 70 degrees Celsius, the power protection device will be intelligently activated to turn it off, to ensure the safety of the operator and the device.

The device is also suitable for low temperature operation.

Wide Compatibility: Suitable for all vechicles

VXSCAN V3 vacuum leak smoke machine is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats.

It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

Read more

Pressure Gauge Displays

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Fast Smoke Output

This machine built-in air compressor, with superior wick and heating element.

It can produce smoke instantly by heating up USP mineral oil or baby oil. 4ft Smoke Outlet Pipe can help reach and connect perfectly.

Note: Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.

Notice before Leak Test

Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle.

It can’t be connected to the 12v power supply in the office, or it cannot output the smoke.It just support a 12V battery with a current range of 8A-10A (Ordinary car batteries are eligible).

Read more

Price: $219.99 - $186.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:34:51 UTC – Details)


The Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier, is the high-efficiency air purifier to clean a whole room properly. AirSight Plus technology scans the surrounding air for airborne particles as small as 0.3um, this air purifier focuses on real-time home conditions – this is more than just having an air purifier. Levoit engineers designed the air purifier’s internal structure to provide powerful air purification while maintaining noise levels as low as 24dB. 
Features:

  • Intelligently purifies the air in a 403 sq ft room 5x per hour
  • HEPASmart technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home – Our air purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles as small as 0.3 microns including pollen, dust and more.
  • 360° filtration system uses activated carbon to remove gases and odors and a H13 True HEPA filter to capture 99.97% pollutants as small as 0.3 microns.
  • Automatically senses and reacts to changes in air quality – then reports pollution in real time on LCD screen and on your free VeSync Link app.
  • In the sleep mode, the air purifier monitors and purifies using the quiet settings, with a dimmed display and can be totally turned off.
  • Program your machine to turn off after pre-set intervals between 1 -12 hours.
  • Safe and easy to clean with low maintenance, easy-to-replace filters. With built-in notifications when they require replacing.
  • Using compatible voice control services, control your air purifier with simple, spoken instructions. Works with Alexa and Googlevoice Assistant.
  • Warning – unauthorized replacement filters are not tested or verified to perform at HEPA standard. Only authentic Levoit  filters are recommended to ensure a sealed system and proper functioning of the machine. The official Levoit Core 400S replacement filter can be found by searching “B08SQQK6K7” in the search bar.

LARGE COVERAGE: The top-performing Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier can purify large rooms, such as bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, and basements. Purify a 403 ft² room 5x per hour and a 990 ft² room 2x per hour
3-STAGE FILTRATION: Filtration includes a Pre-Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, which traps viruses, bacteria, pollen,dust, and pet dander, and a Custom High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter that helps neutralize odors, cooking and wildfire smoke, and VOCs
WHISPER-LEVEL QUIET: Keep the Core 400S running throughout the night, as Sleep Mode uses the lowest fan speed (24dB) to create a sleep-friendly space that’s as quiet as falling leave
COMBAT ALLERGIES AND ASTHMA: Powerful air purification during allergy and wildfire seasons helps capture allergens that cause sneezing, congestion, breathing difficulties, and other symptoms
VIEW AIR QUALITY: The laser dust sensor scans the surrounding air for airborne particles, continuously updating the PM2.5 display and creating graphs in the VeSync app so you can see how your air quality has improved
HANDS-FREE VOICE COMMAND: Hands-free control with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant allows you to control settings when your hands are full with cooking, caring for babies and children, or playing with pets
SCHEDULE SETTINGS TO MATCH YOUR ROUTINE: Program the air purifier to use different modes and fan speeds at certain times, so you can have your week planned in advance. With scheduling, you never have to worry about forgetting to change your settings
TRUSTWORTHY AND SAFE: The Core 400S is Energy Star and FCC certified, ETL listed, and a recipient of the German Design Award (2021) and iF Design Award (2021). Only use Levoit replacement filters (search B08SQQK6K7) for best results and product performance

Control settings from anywhere, as well as create schedules, check filter life, view real-time air quality updates, and more with the free Vesync app.

Is meal prepping keeping your hands full? Use Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant to adjust air purifier settings.

Check out the all-new OnePlus Nord N20 5G, premium 5G at an amazing price! Experience the power of the largest 5G network, enabling blazing fast download and upload speeds. The premium 6.43” AMOLED display puts all-day immersive entertainment in the palm of your hands. Powered by a massive 4500mAh battery, the Nord N20 5G handles all your movies, TV shows, and games without breaking a sweat. With expansive 128 GB storage and excellent RAM, you’ll have all the power & space you need to run your games and apps smoothly. Take stunning photos and videos with a versatile triple-camera system. If you run out of power, get a day’s power in half an hour, with 33W fast charging. The OnePlus Nord N20 5G packs a powerful punch, making premium specs and the power of 5G more accessible than ever.
6.43” Display – Immerse yourself into your favorite content with a large FHDplus AMOLED Display, delivering sharp detail and deep colors.
Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 – With 6GB of powerful RAM and a 5G Snapdragon processor, the N20 5G can handle anything from your favorite content to streaming online games.
Large 4500mAh Battery – Spend less time plugged in with an extra large battery.
33W Fast Charging – Get a day’s power in half an hour with 33W Fast Charging.
6GB RAM – Download your favorite games and apps and switch seamlessly between them.
128GB Storage – Store photos and videos without worry with large expandable storage, up to 512GB.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $299.99 - $229.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:43 UTC – Details)


Check out the all-new OnePlus Nord N20 5G, premium 5G at an amazing price! Experience the power of the largest 5G network, enabling blazing fast download and upload speeds. The premium 6.43” AMOLED display puts all-day immersive entertainment in the palm of your hands. Powered by a massive 4500mAh battery, the Nord N20 5G handles all your movies, TV shows, and games without breaking a sweat. With expansive 128 GB storage and excellent RAM, you’ll have all the power & space you need to run your games and apps smoothly. Take stunning photos and videos with a versatile triple-camera system. If you run out of power, get a day’s power in half an hour, with 33W fast charging. The OnePlus Nord N20 5G packs a powerful punch, making premium specs and the power of 5G more accessible than ever.
6.43” Display – Immerse yourself into your favorite content with a large FHDplus AMOLED Display, delivering sharp detail and deep colors.
Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 – With 6GB of powerful RAM and a 5G Snapdragon processor, the N20 5G can handle anything from your favorite content to streaming online games.
Large 4500mAh Battery – Spend less time plugged in with an extra large battery.
33W Fast Charging – Get a day’s power in half an hour with 33W Fast Charging.
6GB RAM – Download your favorite games and apps and switch seamlessly between them.
128GB Storage – Store photos and videos without worry with large expandable storage, up to 512GB.
